targets.query:
from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305140/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/descomain/E")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305142/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/etp/E")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305145/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/HAMEEM/CWL/elec/main/deep2/flow_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

etp1=from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305172/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/HAMEEM/CWL/elec/main/etpin1/flow_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

  etp2=from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305173/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/HAMEEM/CWL/elec/main/etpin2/flow_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])


    union(tables: [etp1, etp2])
  |>sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305091/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/CWL/elec/main/airf1/flow_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305140/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/descomain/P")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305140/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/descomain/E")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305142/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/etp/P")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305142/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/etp/E")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/hameem_TN2305140/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/HAMEEM/elec/main/descomain/E")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /1000.00 * 0.53/1000.0}))
